name: Over My Head Shelter (CLOSED)
description: The Over My Head Shelter was a homeless shelter located in Somerset, Kentucky that provided temporary housing and support services to individuals experiencing homelessness. According to news reports from September 2022, the shelter has permanently closed its doors. The shelter was operated by Over My Head, a non-profit organization, and served the Somerset community for several years before closing.
source: Verified from Commonwealth Journal news article dated September 1, 2022
hours: CLOSED - Permanently closed as of September 2022
services: Formerly provided homeless shelter services - now closed
notes: According to news reports, the Over My Head Shelter permanently closed its doors in September 2022. Steve Hall, president of Over My Head, confirmed the closure. The organization cited various challenges including financial difficulties and operational issues as reasons for the closure. This resource should be marked as inactive or removed from active listings.
